title: Fix broken portfolio images by generating new images and updating component references

requirements.text: Fix the PortfolioGallery component to correctly reference portfolio images from the frontend/public/assets/generated directory, ensuring all 120 images (30 per category: Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) display properly without broken image icons

quotes: All the portfolio images. Started after the recent update.

acceptanceCriteria: All portfolio images use correct public asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/filename.png)
No broken image icons appear in any portfolio category
Image paths match the exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated
All 120 images (30 Home, 30 Commercial, 30 Office, 30 Hotels) render successfully

requirements.text: Verify that the portfolio image filenames in the PortfolioGallery component match the exact generated filenames using proper public asset paths instead of relative imports
acceptanceCriteria: Component uses /assets/generated/ prefix for all image paths
Filenames follow the pattern: home-1.png through home-30.png, commercial-1.png through commercial-30.png, office-1.png through office-30.png, hotels-1.png through hotels-30.png
No import statements are used for portfolio images
All image references are string paths to public assets

requirements.text: Render all 120 generated portfolio images from frontend/public/assets/generated directory in the PortfolioGallery component with proper titles and descriptions for each category
acceptanceCriteria: 30 Home category images with residential-appropriate titles and descriptions
30 Commercial category images with retail/restaurant/showroom titles and descriptions
30 Office category images with corporate workspace titles and descriptions
30 Hotels category images with luxury hospitality titles and descriptions
Each image entry includes a unique, descriptive title
Each image entry includes a detailed description appropriate to its category theme

constraints: All portfolio images must be stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Image paths must use public asset format (/assets/generated/filename.png)
Do not modify backend code - this is a frontend-only fix
Maintain existing PortfolioGallery component structure with tabbed categories
Preserve the dialog-based lightbox interface for viewing images
nonGoals: Changing the portfolio gallery layout or tab structure
Updating other sections of the website
Changing the number of images per category (must remain 30 each)
